content: {A思考}A new friend has come to visit already?! That's fantastic! <style=SizeSmall>Alright, guess it's time to start yet another "never-ending list of needs."</style>
info: 初见云果-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A点头}Hmm, I'm just sorting out my schedule for each day. For example, every Monday I'll fold and recycle all the empty boxes. On Tuesdays, I'll sort and label the newly arrived goods.
info: 初见云果-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: Thursdays are for handling the circulation of unwanted goods, helping them find new owners who need them, and so on... {A害羞挠头}Solid planning is essential for a store to operate smoothly.
info: 初见云果-格连闲聊_主流程文本
